body_html:
Interesting question. I'm guessing it involves partitioning the space to avoid iterating in the parts of the image which have provably diverged (imaginary part greater than 2). The Wikipedia article is actually quite good there.

Maybe we could do some sort of SparseTensor followup which gets a speedup.

body:
Interesting question. I'm guessing it involves partitioning the space to avoid iterating in the parts of the image which have provably diverged (imaginary part greater than 2). The Wikipedia article is actually quite good there.

Maybe we could do some sort of SparseTensor followup which gets a speedup.
